svg.text: The day before school started, Inara started feeling a little more scared than before. She had many worries. Scary thoughts were getting piled-up inside her tummy and turning into a big knot. A worry-knot.
She was trying to eat an apple. But the worry-knot in her tummy seemed to get bigger. It left no space for food. She didn’t feel like finishing her apple. She felt tears starting to form in her eyes.
